lore: Technoarcheologists are seekers of divine arcana, driven to uncover that which is hidden and to analyse its capabilities. Hardened to life on the Imperiumâ€™s dangerous frontiers, these priests employ cogitative instincts to detect approaching foes and awaken their servitor guardians to effective modes of attack.

faction: Seekers of Divine Arcana: While this model is leading a unit

add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.Cogitative Instincts: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" horizontally of this model.
